text: Žarko Petan (27 March 1929 – 2 May 2014) was a Slovenian writer, essayist, screenwriter, and theatre and movie director. He is known as a writer of aphorisms. His career began in 1950. He wrote over 100 essays and novels. Between 1992 and 1994, he served as Director General of the Slovenian National Radio and Television Broadcast. Petan was born in Ljubljana, Slovenia. Petan died on 2 May 2014 at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Slovenian writers Category:Screenwriters Category:Yugoslavian essayists Category:Movie directors Category:People from Ljubljana
